short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add your tags you want to sift through then hover over the item to see its tags.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension further adds filtering and search functionality to furaffinity's search engine.
It allows blacklisting and whitelisting based on the post's tags as well as hovering to preview the post's tags.
